description: C'est Bio L'Anjou is a nurturing initiative located in Rochefort-sur-Loire. The project aims to address the challenges faced by local canteens and producers by creating a logistics platform that connects them, facilitating the delivery of organic and local produce. The initiative also focuses on training and education, promoting sustainable cooking practices, and fostering a collaborative ecosystem among local stakeholders. By establishing partnerships with various producers and chefs, C'est Bio L'Anjou aims to create a more virtuous food system that respects the environment and enhances community well-being.
name: C'est Bio L'Anjou
